langsim.utils.kirshenbaum module¶

Convert Kirshenbaum’s ASCII IPA to Unicode IPA.

ascii_to_unicode(s)[source]¶

ASCII-IPA to Unicode IPA. Note: because of the simple syntax, the peculiar control flow is fine.

unicode_to_ascii(s)[source]¶

Unicode IPA to ASCII-IPA
